titles.title: A concurrent resolution congratulating Charles "Buddy" Rogers for his outstanding entertainment achievements and philanthropic endeavors.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 10/13/1987--Introduced. Declares that the Congress congratulates Charles "Buddy" Rogers for his entertainment achievements and philanthropic endeavors.
